segments.text: This is the menu . What would you like to have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know what to have . If you don't mind , I'll just leave the choice to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With pleasure , sir . May I suggest Steamed stuffed buns and deep-fried twisted dough sticks ? They are popular breakfast among Chinese people .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . We usually serve soya-bean milk and jellied beancurd . Which one do you prefer , sir ? A
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll try the soya-bean milk this time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , that's steamed stuffed buns and deep-fried twisted dough sticks , and a Soya-bean milk .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . Just a moment , please .
segments.speaker: S1
